name: TextSymbol
description: Text symbols are used to add text on the graphics layer.
summary: display labels for points, polylines and polygons

properties.name: text
properties.summary: Text string for display in the graphics layer

properties.name: horizontalAlignment
properties.summary: Horizontal alignment of the text with respect to the graphic

properties.name: verticalAlignment
properties.summary: Vertical alignment of the text with respect to the graphic

properties.name: kerning
properties.summary: Determines whether to adjust the spacing between characters in the text string

properties.name: rotated
properties.summary: Determines whether every character in the text string is rotated

properties.name: xoffset
properties.summary: The offset on the x-axis in pixels

properties.name: yoffset
properties.summary: The offset on the y-axis in pixels

methods.name: setAlign
methods.summary: Sets the alignment of the text

methods.name: setAngle
methods.summary: Sets the angle of the text

methods.name: setHorizontalAlignment
methods.summary: Updates the horizontal alignment of the text symbol

methods.name: setVerticalAlignment
methods.summary: Updates the vertical alignment of the text symbol

methods.name: setKerning
methods.summary: Sets whether to adjust the spacing between characters in the text string

methods.name: setOffset
methods.summary: Sets the x and y offset of the text

methods.name: setRotated
methods.summary: Sets whether every character in the text string is rotated
